subject: Re: Harsh: Selectively running tests
msgSnippet: One class can be written. It will take the name of the workbook from the system e.g. java -DWORKBOOK=abc.xls junit.textui.TestRunner TestWBK Within Java, then
messageBody:
One class can be written. It will take the name of the workbook from
the system e.g.
java -DWORKBOOK=abc.xls junit.textui.TestRunner TestWBK
Within Java, then we can use
private String workbook = System.getProperty("WORKBOOK");
to get the workbookname.

Multiple parameters can also be passed as separate parameters or in
the same parameter separated by a delimitor.

Hope this helps.............Vijay.
